verses.verse: I will extol<WH7311> you<WH430>, my God, O king<WH4428>; and I will bless<WH1288> your name<WH8034> for ever<WH5769> and ever<WH5703>.
Every day<WH3117> will I bless<WH1288> you<WH1984>; and I will praise your name<WH8034> for ever<WH5769> and ever<WH5703>.
Great<WH1419> is the Lord<WH3068>, and greatly<WH3966> to be praised<WH1984>; and his greatness<WH1420> is unsearchable<WH2714>.
One<WH1755> generation<WH1755> shall praise<WH7623> your works<WH4639> to another<WH5046>, and shall declare your mighty acts<WH1369>.
I will speak<WH7878> of the glorious<WH3519> honor<WH1926> of your majesty<WH1935>, and of your wondrous<WH6381> works<WH1697>.
And men shall speak<WH559> of the might<WH5807> of your terrible acts<WH3372>: and I will declare<WH5608> your greatness<WH1420>.
They shall abundantly utter<WH5042> the memory<WH2143> of your great<WH7227> goodness<WH2898>, and shall sing<WH7442> of your righteousness<WH6666>.
The Lord<WH3068> is gracious<WH2587>, and full of compassion<WH7349>; slow<WH750> to anger<WH639>, and of great<WH1419> mercy<WH2617>.
The Lord<WH3068> is good<WH2896> to all<WH7356>: and his tender mercies are over all his works<WH4639>.
All your works<WH4639> shall praise<WH3034> you<WH3068>, O Lord; and your saints<WH2623> shall bless you<WH1288>.
They shall speak<WH559> of the glory<WH3519> of your kingdom<WH4438>, and talk<WH1696> of your power<WH1369>;
To make known<WH3045> to the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120> his mighty acts<WH1369>, and the glorious<WH3519> majesty<WH1926> of his kingdom<WH4438>.
Your kingdom<WH4438> is a everlasting<WH5769> kingdom<WH4438>, and your dominion<WH4475> endures throughout all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>.
The Lord<WH3068> upholds<WH5564> all that fall<WH5307>, and raises up<WH2210> all those that be bowed down<WH3721>.
The eyes<WH5869> of all wait<WH7663> upon you<WH5414>; and you give them their food<WH400> in due season<WH6256>.
You open<WH6605> your hand<WH3027>, and satisfiest<WH7646> the desire<WH7522> of every living thing<WH2416>.
The Lord<WH3068> is righteous<WH6662> in all his ways<WH1870>, and holy<WH2623> in all his works<WH4639>.
The Lord<WH3068> is near<WH7138> unto all them that call<WH7121> upon him<WH7121>, to all that call upon him in truth<WH571>.
He will fulfill<WH6213> the desire<WH7522> of them that fear<WH3373> him<WH8085>: he also will hear their cry<WH7775>, and will save them<WH3467>.
The Lord<WH3068> preserves<WH8104> all them that love<WH157> him<WH7563>: but all the wicked will he destroy<WH8045>.
My mouth<WH6310> shall speak<WH1696> the praise<WH8416> of the Lord<WH3068>: and let all flesh<WH1320> bless<WH1288> his holy<WH6944> name<WH8034> for ever<WH5769> and ever<WH5703>.
